name: Return of Ai
description:
Greetings from Cymoor's team!

This is our game «The Return of Ai» for the jam of visual novels.

This visual novel with puzzle elements introduces you to the eerie Hogweed universe. You are a tiny creature waking up in a strange creepy spot of a vast unknown world. You don’t remember who you are or how you got here. Be quick to restore your memory, though, for hogweed is not the scariest thing in this area.

Features: 
  • Free
  • Will take little of your time
  • Original art and music
  • Two endings
  • Russian and English interface
  • Voice acting in Russian
